title: 0065 sleep problem
message: have a different 0065 that intermittently goes in to sleep mode, boots, all is well, then sleeps. It is also effected when I close the lid without shutting it the all way. Tried new TP. Didn't help. Ideas? (TP works btw)

title: 0065 sleep problem
message: Sleep sensor is on IO board, so first thing is to try another one and flat cable.

title: 0065 sleep problem
message: Changed out I/O, and flat cable.  Now it boots up with lid closed, but shuts down/sleeps with lid open.... so weird

title: 0065 sleep problem
message: SMC_LID high? Corrosion in connector. Corrosion in trackpad connector?
